dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare trespass in our icy domain, human. What business do you have here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek passage through your territory, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harm or not, outsiders are not welcome. Turn back now or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for intruding, I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. Prepare for a cold reception.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I underestimated your power. I will retreat immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakling! Your cowardice seals your fate. Ice Fangs, attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave. I will fight if I must.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. You've sealed your fate, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave. Your kind has no authority over me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn human. You leave me no choice but to eliminate you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You wouldn't dare lay a hand on me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I do not need my hands to deal with the likes of you. Ice storm, engulf them!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I welcome your challenge. Let's settle this in combat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, brave one. Ice Fangs, show them our power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. Can we not find a way to coexist?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Ha! Humans and Ice Beasts do not mix. Leave now before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respect your territory and leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Return to where you came from, and we shall consider this a warning.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to be driven away. I will stay and prove we can coexist.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish human. Prepare to witness the power of the ice.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have business of my own, and your kind won't stand in my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for an outsider. Prepare to face the chilling consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I don't have time for this. Stand aside or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your impertinence will cost you dearly. Ice Fangs, show them no mercy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will make you regret challenging me. Prepare for a frosty defeat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You overestimate your chances. Ice storm, freeze them in their tracks!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's settle this quickly. I have no patience for your games.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impatient fool. Ice Fangs, teach them the price of haste.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I care not for your warnings. I will continue on my path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You defy the natural order, human. A lesson in humility is in order.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no beasts. Show me what you're capable of.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravery will be your downfall. Ice storm, unleash your fury!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Let's see who the true victor will be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Ice Fangs, teach this one a lesson they won't forget.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense hostility in your voice. We don't have to be enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enemies we are, enemies we shall remain. Prepare for the consequences of your naivety.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respect your wishes and leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave now before my patience runs out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to be threatened by a mere beast. Let's settle this once and for all.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Ice Fangs, silence this fool once and for all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge of the ice beasts. Will you share your wisdom with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Human, you have much to learn about our kind. Choose your next words carefully.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek understanding and wish to learn from your kind. Will you teach me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Learning from us will not save you from your ignorance. The time for discourse is over.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave and ponder on the insights you have shared.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good. Return to your kind and spread the word of our power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I insist on gaining knowledge, even if by force.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Forceful human. Ice Fangs, show them the consequences of their arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave until my thirst for knowledge is quenched. Share your wisdom with me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Persistence will be your downfall, human. Ice Fangs, silence this foolish creature.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't leave empty-handed. Show me what you're truly capable of.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You asked for it. Ice storm, teach this one a lesson in respect.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to share your wisdom through combat. Let our strength determine the outcome.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Ice Fangs, show them the folly of their challenge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek peaceful coexistence and mutual understanding. Can we not find a way to achieve this?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful coexistence is a fantasy, human. Prepare for the reality of our icy wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave in peace, hoping for a future where understanding is possible.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave now, and do not return. The next encounter will not end well for you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If peaceful coexistence is impossible, then let us settle this through combat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Ice Fangs, show this one the price of their foolish ideals.
